amendment.description: To provide a deficit-neutral reserve fund for the restoration of SCHIP funds.

vote.text: Amendment SA 194 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 194 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR S2930-2932; text: CR S2930) To provide a deficit-neutral reserve fund for the restoration of SCHIP funds.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 194 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 194 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Hatch.
